metadata.title: CVE-2020-25040 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Sylabs Singularity through 3.6.2 has Insecure Permissions on temporarydirectories used in explicit and implicit container build operations, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2020-25039.

criterions.comment: singularity-container: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
